featured.text: The many awards that Professor Wang has won over the years are clear ______ that he is a distinguished scholar.
From the late 1850s until his death in 1910, Winslow Homer produced a body of work distinguished by its thoughtful expression and its independence from artistic conventions.

definition.en_def: To recognize or point out the differences between two or more things.
definition.example: It is important to distinguish between fact and opinion.
